pre_caption: The video begins with a wide shot where underwater rocks and pebbles fill the entire frame, extending from the immediate foreground into the middle ground. The camera then moves vertically upwards, breaking the surface to create a split-level view that places the underwater rocks in the foreground at the bottom of the frame and the shoreline in the middle ground above. As the camera settles at water level, the scene is framed as a wide shot of the beach. A young boy sits in the center-left middle ground at the water's edge. To his left, two young girls and a seated man are positioned along the rocky shore, also in the middle ground. In the background, lush trees line the shore from the left to the center, with a large, forested mountain rising behind them and extending to the right. Other beachgoers and thatched-roof huts are visible in the middle ground from the center to the right side of the frame. The camera remains at the same height as the people on the shore.

Further to the left, another young girl with brown skin and dark hair stands in a white one-piece swimsuit. Near them, a man with a darker complexion sits wearing a white shirt.
